name: Elcyc
description:
You play as an archer, engineer and mercenary and your mission is to retrieve an artifact inside a space station infested by aliens. But Time and Space behave strangely.

You cycle trough 3 different characters and levels, based on a 30 second timer.

Controls: 

WASD / Arrows : Move

Mouse Left/Enter: Attack

Mouse Right/Right Shift : Dodge

Escape : Game Over

Simply go right, kill every alien you find, and do not die.

You can chose your difficulty (easy/normal/hard).
